definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: Is it possible to make the dialog draggable even after removing the titlebar?
sentences.chinese: 這可能使對話即使除去標題欄拖動？

sentences.english: Arrangement of buttons on the titlebar.
WS _OVERLAPPED Creates an overlapped window. An overlapped window usually has a caption and a border.
sentences.chinese: 即產生一個帶有邊框和標題欄的窗口。

sentences.english: Use these buttons to set the alignment of the titlebar caption text.
sentences.chinese: 使用這些按鈕設定標題欄標題文本的排列情況。

sentences.english: The header lists the configuration and application requirements for each scenario.
sentences.chinese: 標題欄中列出了每個場景的配置和應用程序需求。
製作一個檢視窗口標題欄。
